name: Thoth and the Platformer Shelf Thieves
name_original: Thoth and the Platformer Shelf Thieves
description:
For Mini Jam 61 - Theme: Ancient Egypt

Lord Thoth is protecting the books from Platformer Tiles that want to steal them. Short and silly.

Use Arrow keys or ASWD keys to move Thoth, and left-click or Space Bar to throw his staff.

(Enjaku's first jam, and my first time coding for one... or indeed coding in this engine. My Leave Game button seems to only stop the game... Fun times :) )

Enjoy!

enjaku.itch.io
